name: It Starts With a Kingpin Account
author: Renshan Animation
content: The sudden crisis brought the earth directly into the OL era, and all of humanity fell into the hands of unknown forces. Everyone became level one. In the cruel era of the law of the jungle, high school student Ye Hao could only rise to level three. On the verge of death, he accidentally opened the king account upgrade system. Can Ye Hao become the strongest king?
